welcome.title: project management
welcome.features-desc: with our application you will have more time for
welcome.info: This application is the final project created as part of the RS School 'Developing with Angular' course. 'Project Management' is another version of the implementation of programs that help manage projects based on the kanban method.
role: Teamlead, developed application architecture, routing, responsible for Husky, for boards component.Created backend services and deploy.
Responsible for localization, edit profile form, header/footer components, toasts and modal windows
Responsible for the forms: authorization, registration. Implemented boards component.
